meanings.definition: Intifadahs: plural form of intifadah, a Palestinian uprising against Israeli occupation.
meanings.sent1: The intifadahs in the region have caused a lot of tension.
meanings.sent2: The news reported on the intifadahs happening in the Middle East.
meanings.sent3: During the intifadahs, even the smallest actions can have big consequences.
meanings.sent4: The intifadahs were like a storm brewing in the desert, unstoppable and fierce.
meanings.sent5: The intifadahs painted a vivid picture of resistance and struggle.

meanings.definition: Intifadahs: a period of violent unrest or rebellion in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: People were afraid to go out during the intifadahs.
meanings.sent2: The intifadahs brought chaos and uncertainty to the region.
meanings.sent3: The intifadahs turned the streets into a battleground of ideas.
meanings.sent4: The intifadahs were a wildfire of emotions spreading through the land.
meanings.sent5: The intifadahs left a lasting mark on the history of the Middle East.
